price: እነዚያ በእነርሱ ላይ ከመቻላችሁ (ከመወሰናችሁ) በፊት የተጸጸቱ ሲቀሩ፡፡ አላህም መሓሪ አዛኝ መኾኑን እወቁ፡፡
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ تَابُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَقۡدِرُواْ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna tābū min qabli an taqdirū ʿalayhim fa-iʿ'lamū anna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
